name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 9
install_guide_markdown:
# RHEL 9 Installation Guide

RHEL 9 is a production-ready enterprise distribution. Red Hat subscription required for official support.

install_steps.title: Obtain RHEL 9 ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Download from Red Hat Customer Portal with valid subscription.

install_steps.title: Boot Installer
install_steps.detail_md: Create bootable media and boot into Anaconda.

install_steps.title: Run Anaconda
install_steps.detail_md: Complete interactive installation with security options.

install_steps.title: Register System
install_steps.detail_md: Register with Red Hat subscription for updates.

install_steps.title: Apply Updates
install_steps.detail_md: Enable repos and apply security patches.

privacy_notes: RHEL collects minimal anonymous usage data for improvement.
notes: RHEL requires subscription for official support. Free developer licenses available.
